game.name: Mon Bazou
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build your crappy vehicle into a race car, install the parts yourself. Make money by cutting wood, racing at night or delivering pizza. Maybe you want to manage a sugar shack or build yourself a big garage?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your crappy vehicle into a race car, install the parts yourself. Make money by cutting wood, racing at night or delivering pizza. Maybe you want to manage a sugar shack or build yourself a big garage?

reviewHighlights.text: 약간의 버그가 있지만, 갓겜입니다! 버그: 차고가 지어질 때, 그자리 벽 쪽에 차를 세워 놓으면 차가 낌. 차가 박았을 때, 죽지 않는 것 하고, 안전벨트가 없는 게 아쉬었어요. 그 외의 시스템은 아주 좋아요!
